string-array.item: 🎉 2020 Final: Bayern Munich beat PSG 1–0 in Lisbon
🏆 This was Bayern\'s 6th Champions League title
🌟 Tournament Format Changed Due to COVID-19
🔥 Fastest Goal: Serge Gnabry (4 minutes vs Chelsea)
👕 Unique Feature: All knockout matches played in Portugal
📈 Record: First team to win all group matches (Bayern)
🥇 Bayern Munich became the first team in history to win the Champions League with a perfect record (11 wins in 11 games)
🔄 The tournament was suspended for 5 months due to the COVID-19 pandemic before resuming in August 2020
🏟️ The quarter-finals, semi-finals, and final were played as single-leg ties at neutral venues in Lisbon
⚖️ Five substitutions per team were allowed due to COVID-19 concerns
🇩🇪 Bayern scored 43 goals throughout the tournament, a record for a Champions League campaign
🤯 Bayern\'s 8-2 win against Barcelona in the quarter-finals was one of the most shocking results in Champions League history
🧤 Manuel Neuer kept 6 clean sheets during the tournament
🔴 This was the first Champions League final without spectators in the stadium
👑 Thomas Müller set a record with 21 Champions League assists for Bayern Munich
🌍 The 2020 final was the first all-German coaching final with Hansi Flick and Thomas Tuchel
🥅 Bayern won their second treble (Bundesliga, German Cup, Champions League) in 2019-20
